title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 100.45 - Coxsackie Correctional Facility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 100.45 - Coxsackie Correctional Facility

State Regulations
(a) There shall be in the department an
institution to be known as Coxsackie Correctional Facility, which shall be
located at West Coxsackie in Greene County, New York, and which shall consist
of the property under the jurisdiction of the department at that
location. (b) Such institution
shall be a correctional facility for males between the ages of 18 and 21; provided, however, that males over the age of 21 may be placed therein for
general confinement purposes in accordance with Part 110 of this

Chapter. (c) Coxsackie Correctional

Facility shall be classified as a maximum security correctional facility, to be
used for the following functions: (1)
general
confinement facility. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7

100.45

Amended

New

York State Register July 22, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 29, eff. 7/22/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
